content:
Currently, announcements (from the Zulip Notification Bot) of new streams go in #general and announcements of new users go into a private stream called "core team".

I was thinking, we could consolidate them into #general.

@Oliver Bertuch you're thinking we should consolidate them too but maybe have a different name? Announcements?
I was thinking along the lines of Dataverse related announcement, not Zulip announcements ;-)
Someone might be interested in subscribing to a low volume, important messages stream
Oh! Good because I do think just "announcements" would make people think of Dataverse releases or whatever.
Yes exactly, stuff like that would be perfect for such a stream
Or your announcement of the CT WG

Ok. I renamed this topic. Let's focus on what the bot is announcing: new users and streams.

We could simply disable this.
I see. I found it nice to know someone is joining the channel. Is this a different notification? Like a user subscribed to some stream?
I'm not very interested in learning about a new user itself, but seeing if and when people subscribe to streams they are interested in
Hmm, yes, maybe it's different
It doesn't look like there is a nofication for new subscribers
Yeah, I don't think so either. Just checked. :happy:
At least I don't see it in the settings
So maybe it would be nice to have at least the announcement about a new user in #community
So we can great new folks upon entry like we did before
What about announcements from the bot of new streams? Disable them? Put them in #community too?
IMHO depends a bit on whether we want people to create their own streams
If we want people to ask us for a dedicated stream, maybe we don't need these notifications
I sort of hate to say this but I think admins should create the streams. Otherwise I fear clutter.

Uh don't hate yourself. I think so, too. It worked well in Slack and I don't see a need for 1000 streams. It went pretty well with a single one so far. it will be good to have some more specialized ones for working groups etc
What about a stream called "#new members and streams"?
Dunno if that is helpful.
Maybe use #community for now and change later if that's too much clutter?
So basically, rename #general to #community? Sounds fine. Please go ahead.
Done! Great! What about the new streams announcements? Send them to #zulip ?
Or disable them?
We could always announce new streams manually. A personal touch. :happy:
Sorry, I'm distracted by my daughter asking me about math homework. :sweat_smile:

Here is the current state of play:
Screenshot-2023-03-09-at-7.16.09-AM.png
I would like to redirect new user announcements or disable them. Thoughts?
I just disabled them (new user announcements).
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
